Text:
Would really appreciate uploading the 'PROPER' release The.Intouchables.2011.1080p.BluRay.x264-NODLABS.

And Robot.and.Frank.2012.LIMITED.720p.BluRay.X264-AMIABLE would be nice too!
The quality is the same, so no need. you just get a few more pixels at the side. Makes no difference.
It's actually because of the hardsubs.
There is already a version without subtitles.
